description: This table contains data associated with task (LTK) records.

columns.name: TASK_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the worklist activity.

columns.name: TASK
columns.description: The task to be performed.

columns.name: WL_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This notes the priority of the task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: WORK_UNITS
columns.description: This is the number of work units required to perform a task.

columns.name: SKILLS_NEEDED_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the skill set required to perform a task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: WORKLIST_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category associated with this task (i.e. meds, education, vitals).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LINK_SOURCE
columns.description: The master file initials for the record that is the source of this task. This can be LPI, ORD, LGL, FLO, IGL, LDA, SSC, or DM_CSN.  If the Source is : Best Practice Alert then LOCATOR_ID has the Alert ID (LGL)

columns.name: LINK_RECORD
columns.description: The ID of the record that is the source of this task.

columns.name: LOCATOR_ID
columns.description: If the task is linked to an alert (LGL masterfile) the ID of the Alert is stored here.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: If the task is linked to an intervention (LPI masterfile) the ID of the Care Plan Intervention is stored here.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: If the task is linked to an Order (ORD masterfile) the ID of the Order is stored here.

columns.name: MSTEP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the status of the given multistep order entry task


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Active


Discontinued


Completed

columns.name: TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type associated with this task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient Specific


User Specific


Patient Event


Episode Specific


MyChart Patient Created

columns.name: LINK_SOURCE_COMP
columns.description: The master file initials for the record that is the source of this task. This can be LPI, ORD, LGL, FLO, IGL, LDA, SSC, or DM_CSN.  If the Source is : Best Practice Alert then LOCATOR_ID has the Alert ID (LGL)

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: This item stores the comments related to the given worklist activity.

columns.name: SOURCE_LTR_ID
columns.description: This item stores the unique ID of the task record associated with the worklist activity.

columns.name: SOURCE_LTR_ID_TASK_NAME
columns.description: The name of the task record.

columns.name: AUTO_COMPLETE_COND
columns.description: This column stores the task auto complete condition, which is copied from the associated task (LTR) record.

columns.name: NUM_OCCURRENCES
columns.description: This column stores the number of occurrences for the associated task.

columns.name: PRN_START_INST_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the start instant for a PRN task.

columns.name: DISCONTINUE_DTTM
columns.description: This column stores the instant at which a task was discontinued.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The episode ID with which the task is associated.

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_USER_ID
columns.description: The user responsible to complete the task.

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_POOL_ID
columns.description: The In Basket Pool responsible for completing the task.

columns.name: RESPONSIBLE_POOL_ID_REGISTRY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the In Basket registry in the HIP master file.

columns.name: BEDSIDE_USER_ID
columns.description: The Initiating Bedside User item holds the ID of the MyChart Bedside User who created an ad hoc task, typically a patient request.

columns.name: PAT_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item stores the Patient entered comments/additional details for requests they place in MyChartBedside.

columns.name: STEP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current step of a multi-step task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled


Reviewed

columns.name: OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
The outcome of the task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Positive


Negative


Not Done

columns.name: AUTOCOMP_INSTANCE_ID
columns.description: The deficiency instance associated with this task. This column will be populate for episode-based tasks that are created from a task record (LTR) with an associated autocompletion template (DEF).

columns.name: PARENT_TASK_ID
columns.description: The parent task (LTK) that this child task was created from. This column will be populated for episode-based tasks that were created automatically based on the completion of another task on the episode.

columns.name: REQUIRED_DOC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of required documentation the task corresponds to.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Admission


Transfer


Shift


Before Discharge


Admission Quality Measures


Discharge Quality Measures

columns.name: REQUIRED_DOC_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Required documentation group the task corresponds to.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Other

columns.name: CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The functional context of a task.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


General


Checklist


Staff Activity


Homecare Patient Encounter

columns.name: ASSIGN_TO_PAT_C
columns.description:
This item determines whether a task is assigned to the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PERS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Defines the personalization status of the notification times for the task.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The goal that the task is associated with.

columns.name: INTERVENTIONS_ID
columns.description: The intervention that the task is associated with.

columns.name: LINKED_TREATMENT_DAY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the treatment day linked to the task.

columns.name: LINKED_TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment plan linked to this task.

columns.name: LINKED_DAY_LINE
columns.description: The line in the source record that corresponds to a treatment or timeline day.

columns.name: EST_COMPLETION_START_DATE
columns.description: An estimated start date that the task will be performed based on the lead days of the day in the treatment plan or timeline.

columns.name: EST_COMPLETION_END_DATE
columns.description: An estimated end date that the task will be performed based on the lag days of the day in the treatment plan or timeline.

columns.name: ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The research study-patient association (LAR) record ID linked to this task. This is only populated by tasks created from a billing timeline.

columns.name: SOURCE_LTT_ID
columns.description: This contains a link to the source task template (LTT) record if this task was added by a task template.

columns.name: SOURCE_LTT_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: This column displays the name of the task template record.

columns.name: IS_PAUSED_YN
columns.description:
When a task is assigned to the patient, this item determines whether it's is paused. When a task is paused, it will not have future instances and will not displayed to the patient until resumed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: SCHEDULE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Determines the scheduling status of a patient-assigned task. When a task is created it may not be scheduled right away.  The category table is ZC_TASK_SCHEDULE_STATUS_C.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Scheduled


Not Scheduled


Will Be Scheduled

columns.name: RESUME_ON_DISCHARGE_YN
columns.description:
This item determines if a task paused on hospital admission will be resumed on discharge.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_PAUSED_YN

columns.name: DAYS_AFTER_DISC_NUM
columns.description: Indicates the number of days after hospital discharge this reminder will start. Value must be larger than or equal to 0.

columns.name: ANCHOR_EVENT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
When an anchor event is linked to this task, this stores the type of the anchor event. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Surgery


Pregnancy


Procedural Appointment


Hospital Discharge

columns.name: SURGICAL_OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: Surgical case linked to this task.

columns.name: PREGNANCY_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Pregnancy Episode linked to this task.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_SERIAL_NUMBER_ID
columns.description: Appointment serial number for the appointment linked to this task.
